Articles.Content:
Despite this being our fourth craft, the men (and women?) at the SPH thought it would be funny to slap two pairs of wings on this new plane. Surprisingly, this worked and they all agreed that it was superior to the other idea of one pair of wings. Anyway, we made it, and now we need to sell it. And this is where you come in you sexy devil, you. We need you to buy the bi (see what I did there). All puns aside, here are some marvelous automatic paintings called "pictures."

While our engineers don't know what a "Sopwith" is, nor do they know what a "Camel" is, they think it's overrated and named it the Mule. While it can't carry a lot of stuff, or hike up mountains, or be used for food, it can carry a fairly large payload and that's what counts right?

Right?

.craft will be posted on request.
Hah, very nice! Do the bombs cause balance issues?

Hah, very nice! Do the bombs cause balance issues?

Much like you, I thought it would, but it actually flies very nice with the bombs on.
